review: Love it!  The price is great!
author: Jmanning

review: The Fire Stick is so simple to install and use. I love it! I am not technical at all--It is just a matter of plugging the adapter into to Fire Stick and plugging that in theback of the tv and then plugging the plug into the wall outlet. Easy! Then just follow the short movie tutorial and you are ready to go! The movies are on your screen as soon as you pick them out. Plus you can use Amazon Prime or your Netflix (my list). So far the Fire Stick is the best thing ever!
author: Zee Kay

review: I can't even use this product because the plug won't fit on a power strip. The base is too large to allow it to plug in between two other plugs. This seems to me an easily avoided production flaw.

review: I bought this device when still on pre order... it was only $20 and I thought for this price would be worst than my Chrome Cast... But as soon I got it and stick on my TV, it was pleasant surprise... We replaced Chrome Cast by Fire Stick, because we don't need to have our mobile around to watch moves or TV shows, unless you want to watch Youtube videos...
